elements.title: Robert Todd Lincoln (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Robert Todd Lincoln (pictured) was saved from possible death by Edwin Booth, whose brother, John Wilkes Booth, assassinated Robert's father, Abraham Lincoln?

elements.title: October 1 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Nigerian film October 1 could not be released on October 1, the country's Independence Day?

elements.title: Giulia Dragoni (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in July 2023, Giulia Dragoni became the youngest person to represent any Italian senior national football team – including both men and women – in the 21st century?

elements.title: Vibe Chemistry (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that although Vibe Chemistry's "Balling" only peaked at No. 35 on the UK Singles Chart, it spent ten weeks in the UK Top 40, five of them at No. 38?

elements.title: Gene Locklear (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a painting by Major League Baseball player Gene Locklear was hung in the White House?

elements.title: Widowmaker (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the visual design of Overwatch character Widowmaker was inspired by World of Warcraft character Sylvanas Windrunner?

elements.title: Rudolf Pardede (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that former North Sumatra governor Rudolf Pardede was once the richest public official in Indonesia?

elements.title: Dark Archives (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Dark Archives reveals that most books bound in human skin were made by respected doctors?
